<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>false</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>false</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>rm_sprint</collection>
        <condition>!current.parent.nil() && !current.rollup</condition>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Calculate Start Date for Sprint</name>
        <order>110</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[getTaskEarliestSDate();

function getTaskEarliestSDate() {
	var taskSysId = (current.isNewRecord())?current.parent.sys_id:current.sys_id;
	g_scratchpad.projectTaskSysId = taskSysId;
	var gr = new GlideRecord('planned_task');
	gr.addQuery("sys_id", taskSysId);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		// We will utilize the PlannedTaskManager script include to perform the calculations.
		var ptm = new SNC.ProjectTaskManager();
		ptm.loadAncestors(gr);
        g_scratchpad.pTaskStartDate = ptm.getTaskStartDate(taskSysId);
	}
	var project = current.parent.top_task;
	var tDate = new GlideDateTime();
	if (project.work_start.nil()) {
		tDate.setValue(current.parent.top_task.start_date);
		g_scratchpad.projectStartDate = tDate.getDisplayValue();
	}
	else {
		tDate.setValue(current.parent.top_task.work_start);
		g_scratchpad.projectStartDate = tDate.getDisplayValue();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-01-24 08:38:06</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>1fa8cc48879323000f83d82548cb0b9e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Calculate Start Date for Sprint</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="">bb31d11d93f08210b31a30dcebba1022</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_1fa8cc48879323000f83d82548cb0b9e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-24 08:39:56</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before_display</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1fa8cc48879323000f83d82548cb0b9e"/>
</record_update>
